content: I’m new to Lean. I am using macOS and VSCode and Fish (not-POSIX shell), so I followed the Lean manual’s Quickstart page https://lean-lang.org/lean4/doc/quickstart.html. I can see Lean works on VSCode (e.g. “Lean Infoview” tab). However, Fish and Bash on my iTerm2 don’t recognize lean and elan. Where Elan and Lean are installed?
It should be $HOME/.elan/bin. I'm on a linux/fish machine right now, I have set PATH $HOME/.elan/bin $PATH in my fish config.
Thanks. Now I can use them from shells.
Koki Fushimi has marked this topic as resolved.
